Header: Jaffna Commander Meets Indian Consul General
Content: Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya, the newly-appointed Commander, Security Forces-Jaffna paid a courtesy call on the Consul General of India, resident in Jaffna on Thursday (18). During the cordial meeting, the duo discussed the progress in relation to ongoing civil-military cooperation projects and reconciliation moves. They also touched on the question of further promotion of such mutual bonds during the meet that took place at the Council General Residence.
